alfredsnippet.snippet:
#!/bin/bash
 
# pip install chardet
echo processing: $1
 
for f in `ls $1`
do
    echo file: $f
    encoding=$(head -c 10240 $f | chardetect | awk '{print($2)}')                                      
    echo encoding: $encoding
    if [ $encoding != 'utf-8' -a $encoding != 'ascii' ]
    then
        iconv -f $encoding -t UTF-8//IGNORE $f -o ${f}_utf8
        mv ${f}_utf8 $f
        echo transfered into utf-8, ignore error.
    fi  
done
alfredsnippet.name: convert to utf8
